snippet.title: Magical Delicacy - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: Take another look at the pretty world and gameplay from Magica Delicacy in this latest trailer for the upcoming adventure game where cooking meets Metroidvania-lite. The trailer showcases magical townsfolk you can meet, as well as cooking elements and exploration. Join the young witch Flora on a journey to the harbor town of Grat and help her grow her magical abilities when Magica Delicacy launches in 2024 on PC, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S. Magical Delicacy will also be available on day one with Xbox Game Pass. A demo is available now on Steam until February 12, 2024.
